description: Our API provides comprehensive sentiment analysis for any language, including all major languages and over 140 others, utilizing advanced natural language processing (NLP) techniques and machine learning algorithms. Unlike other tools that only analyze a single language or require manual language detection, our tool automatically detects the language of the input text without requiring additional setup, allowing users to analyze text in any language they need.
